channel.title: Just a thought
channel.description: Assuming Blue Shift is canon, why does Barney wear his outfit when he is shown in HL1, even though according to Blue Shift he doesn't acquire it until later on? I know it's developer oversight on Blue Shift's part, but I'm hoping the Black Mesa development team takes notice of this error.

item.title: Just a thought
item.dc:creator: SoulDestroy
item.description:
Well this is embarrassingL I just checked the wiki to prove that the Black Mesa team is treating Blue Shift as canon and well, turns out that “he will be lacking work-dress and attempting to gain entry to a security block.”

:facepalm:

Read full topic
